actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exclude from gross income the amount of certain cancellations of indebtedness under student loan programs.

summary.text: Excludes from gross income under the Internal Revenue Code any amount of a student loan indebtedness which has been discharged, when such discharge was pursuant to a provision permitting such discharge, if such individual worked in specified professions or specified geographical regions or for specified clssses of employers.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exclude from gross income the amount of certain cancellations of indebtedness under student loan programs.
